mapper.select: select * from( select rownum rnum, a.* from( select * from bestboard order by board_like desc, group_num desc, seq_num asc) a) where rnum>=#{startRow} and rnum <= #{endRow}
mapper.update: update bestboard set count=count+1 where board_num = #{board_num}
mapper.select: select count(*) from storage_list where artist_id=#{artist_id} and board_num=#{board_num}
select subject, artist_id, file_path, image_path, board_num from uploadBoard where board_num = #{board_num}
select subject, artist_id, file_path, image_path, board_num from museBoard where board_num = #{board_num}
mapper.delete: delete from storage_list where board_num=#{board_num} and artist_id=#{artist_id}
